nodes.text: The Gilded Descent Casino was a casino located on the planet Corellia that at some point before enlisting in the Galactic Empire, Han Solo played a game of sabacc at.

The Gilded Descent Casino first appeared in Star Wars canon in the 2018 comic book Han Solo - Imperial Cadet 2. The casino was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
